DEE Assam Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 108 Special Educator Posts
Prasanna / All Government Jobs / Aug 26, 2025, 12:33 IST
 Directorate of Elementary Education
 108 Jobs |  Posted On : 26-Aug-2025 |  Assam |  Salary : 14,000 to 70,000




FOLLOW

The Directorate of Secondary Education (DSE) Assam has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 108 Special Educator Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in Any Degree can grab this chance and apply for the DEE Assam Recruitment 2025. Here are the age limits, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply online through the website on or before the last date of application.




If you are looking for more, here is a list of Government jobs in 2025 that you can all apply for. Use this link for more jobs in Assam.

DEE Assam Recruitment 2025 - Eligibility Criteria
Name of the posts	No.of Vacancies	Qualification
Special Educator 	108	Any Degree

Age Limit for the DEE Assam Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Age Limit: 21 years.
The Maximum Age Limit: 45 years.

Selection Process for the DEE Assam Recruitment 2025

Written Test
Interview

Salary Structure for the DEE Assam Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Salary: Rs. 14,000 / per month.
The Maximum Salary: Rs. 70,000 /- per month.

Application fee for the DEE Assam Recruitment 2025

There is no application fee.
How to Apply for the DEE Assam Recruitment 2025
Visit the official website.
Go to the recruitment or career page.
Check for the Special Educator Jobs 2025.
Read the notification carefully.
Check the eligibility criteria.
If you meet the eligibility criteria.
Click on the Apply Online link.
Fill out the given details carefully.
Pay the application fee (if applicable).
Submit the application form and capture the application number for further reference.

Important Dates

Starting Date of Application	28-08-2025
Last Date of Application	30-09-2025

 

Apply Online	Click Here
Official Notification	Click Here
Join Whatsapp Group	Join Now
